description: Retention of single storey ground floor rear extension and two storey side extension
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-c0d6503d-7fff-f95e-a472-4373b2b511e9"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt;">Notwithstanding the above reason,</span> no </span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">information </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">has been submitted with this application in relation to the front garden shed. The local planning authority is therefore unable to fully assess the merits or otherwise of this proposal and the proposal, therefore, fails to comply with policy D4 (Delivering good design) of the London Plan 2021, policies LP1 and LP2 of Hackney Local Plan 2021 and the stipulations of the Residential Alterations and Extensions SPD 2009.  </span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-c067d344-7fff-bbad-73e6-a0f414bd3f27"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed development, by reason of its design, position and character would result in an incongruous and incompatible form of development which results in a loss of rear amenity space and would therefore fail to respect the character and appearance of the subject property. </span></span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">As such the proposed development is contrary to policies </span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">LP1 (</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Design </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Quality and Local Character</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">) of Hackney Local Plan LP33 2020</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">, policy (D4 Delivering good design) </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">of the London Plan 2021, </span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">and the guidance contained within Hackney's Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2009.</span><br></p><div><span style="font-size: 11.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div>
